website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price point for a basic HDTV. Would require purchasing a sound bar for better audio quality.
pros: Strong image quality for the price
High quality backlight helps to prevent problems with screen glare
cons: Below average audio quality from its built-in speakers

customer_reviews.title: Problems after a few months.  Dead after 7
customer_reviews.text: After about 7 months the picture would blink on and off when the TV is first turned on. At first, it lasted only briefly, but within a few weeks it became a permanent condition. There is no option to repair or replace despite a manufacturers warranty protecting it from defects. Many call to Amazon and Curtis to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Vesparado

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't pay close enough attention to the product description but discovered when this arrived that it has only ONE HDMI port ... no way to plug in your fire stick or attach other devices without first unplugging something else. Call me lazy, but I'm not going to do that!
customer_reviews.author: pgbuzz

customer_reviews.title: Dead in a month
customer_reviews.text: Dead 7 days after the return window closed, and this was just a bedroom TV. All it had to do was sit on a shelf, and be on maybe an hour a night. It failed. Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Austin Shelton

customer_reviews.title: The seller is totally a horrible entity to do business with
customer_reviews.text: TV lasted only 6 months and the picture went out. Upon contacing the seller, they would not honor the warranty and I had to junk this piece of junk. The seller is totally a horrible entity to do business with. Never buy a Proscan.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Villa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picture, but the sound is muffled.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not sure what i was expecting with the crazy low price, but very nice picture. We'll see how it holds up. The speakers are muffled sounding (no bass or treble). I bought a set of L.E.D. computer speakers on Amazon for $15 that hook into the headphone jack and use the USB port for power. Now it looks and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product! I purchased for my son as a Christmas gift and when I recievedo the first one it didn't work. So I gave my son my Samsung TV which is an excellent product and sent back the pre damaged monitor. They sent me a replacement and SURPRISE 3 weeks later this one has no picture and only sound. This is a horrible product and now I'm stuck with this crap TV because I can't get it returned in the timeframe I was given. I'm so upset. Will never purchase another proscan item as long as I like live. It's now a giant paperweight
customer_reviews.author: Larryg

customer_reviews.title: good value for this size tv
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike is the TV can't display at lower resolutions without noticeable blurriness/degradation. Solution - use new UHD resolutions. When I first set it up the backlighting seemed very harsh and hard to look at. It seems much better now, I assume it is changes made in the internal settings that finally addressed the issue, though most of the changes I applied were pretty minor adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wittik

customer_reviews.title: Great size for our bedroom ;)
customer_reviews.text: We use this every night to relax before sleeping. The size is perfect and the quality is awesome. Sound is great as well with no surround sound system. But it is awesome and enjoy it immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was not good
customer_reviews.text: This TV was the perfect size and light weight, which I liked. However, regardless of if we used a soundbar or not, any volume increase brought a distorted crackle noise. Amazon support referred us to the manufacturer who wanted us to prove we purchased the TV before supporting it ... so we returned it and received a full refund by the supplier immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well packaged for
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves this television. Very nice and well packaged for delivery
customer_reviews.author: melanie novaria

customer_reviews.title: Did 'Proscan PLED2435A 24-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV' meet your expectations?
customer_reviews.text: For the price and size of the display, yes it did meet expectations. It's plenty bright, too. I use it as a monitor for security cameras, so picture quality isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: N. McArthur

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 of these tv's for my companies office ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these tv's for my companies office. One of them just quite working for no apparent reason. I guess I get what I pay for. Update 6/17/2019. Now another one of these has just stopped working. Won't even turn on. Really not a good TV.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works really well, but the screen isnt attached to the frame very well so i just move it slowly
customer_reviews.author: darnise

customer_reviews.title: The complete tv experience is most amazing. You can conceptualize that one is watching a ...
customer_reviews.text: The complete tv experience is most amazing. You can conceptualize that one is watching a sporting event, from inside the sports arena. The only difficulty is the mastery and formatting the television remote. The buttons could be larger, and I believe the remote does not light up, when handled. A somewhat trivial point. Thank-You.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tv showed up on time and has a nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: Tv showed up on time and has a nice picture ...Hope i get a few years service out of it..i would probaly buy another one if this one lasts
customer_reviews.author: Don V

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Finally upgraded from my 23inch tv from 10 years ago and couldn’t be happier to replace it with this one! Picture and sound a great, plenty of HDMI ports (3) to attach anything you need, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 of these together at the same time for ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these together at the same time for our dispatch center. They appear to be quality TV's and are bright. They were however slightly different models with different mounting hole patterns. Had to modify the mount to get one of them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 2nd one was great! The clarity was awesome
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got had a few dead pixels, and so a new one was shipped right away. The 2nd one was great! The clarity was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Comvr68

customer_reviews.title: picture is great sound is not as crisp as one would like ...
customer_reviews.text: picture is great sound is not as crisp as one would like but you could always add a sound bar. this TV was just for my office so its fine the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Jungbluth

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. Nice colors, sound isn't the best but not as bad as some people are saying and you can change it to surround sound if you don't like the default sound settings which helps it out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and attach devices. Picture required a few brightness adjustments however I am very satisfied with this purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Minor issue with screen which was replaced quickly and at no cost to me. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stc2581

customer_reviews.title: It's OK. Getting it from Amazon save a trip shopping for it in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's worth only exactly what we paid for it. Not super quality, but not bad. The size is right for the space we needed to have it in.
customer_reviews.author: George G. Cowie

customer_reviews.title: This must be a joke..
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t mad at the 6:45am delivery that woke me up, but to open, what I thought was the beat up box of my new tv, and find a the shattered screen of a used one.... Idk even know what to say. Has to be a mistake. I’m not faulting Amazon for this one. I’m not taking this L however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this brand or model again.
customer_reviews.text: Television lasted 3 months. Will not power up. No picture or sound. Set sleep timer at night and TV would not come on the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great. arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: works great. arrived quickly. perfect little tv for my daughters room

customer_reviews.title: Works fine; but controlled only by remote
customer_reviews.text: Fine image display, works great. One oddity though, there are no controls on the unit itself; everything has to be done with the remote.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Dead in 6 months. Not worth it at all. Not happy at all.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We use this at church for a monitor, does a great job

customer_reviews.text: The tv is just great, and the price was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Could have better sound quality. But for the price it’s perfect. If you want better sound pay more or get a sound Barr. I’m satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: It's a like
customer_reviews.text: Small, but nice color and sound. Perfect for a kids room or office.
customer_reviews.author: Souljah

customer_reviews.title: Works great, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, excellent product. They're lightweight and I am using them as monitors for my computer and security system instead of televisions and find the clarity is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Costly to buy cheap tv
customer_reviews.text: I had the tv 2 weeks before I lost the picture and had to take it in for a $50 repair. I live in the Dominican Republic and couldn't return it without a $100 shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves our purpose
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kids to watch movies and play games on. The sound is below par but you get what you pay for!

customer_reviews.title: Not that thrilled with the color, I am still ...
customer_reviews.text: Not that thrilled with the color, I am still attempting to work with it since I got rid of the box and cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very good TV
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. Only flaw is the design of the remote control, which makes switching functions (from TV to DVD, or ROKU, etc ) manual and tiresome. You cannot assign a channel to those things and just go there. The remote control also has an "enter" button that is small, and not in a place where one would normally find such a button, so it takes some time and reading the manual to figure that out. Once I got past those things, I am pleased with performance. It is worth tweaking things like sound and picture to get good results.
customer_reviews.author: RavenhillTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bright House is now Spectrum I dint have any trouble it hooked right up real nice picture I'm very happy. Got my Mom a 32 inch Samsung for Xmas it was $110 more this is just as nice & the Price Makes it even Better

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. Nice picture
customer_reviews.text: We use it in the patient room of my urgent care. Nice size. Nice picture. Nice sound. GREAT PRICE!

customer_reviews.title: so far the picture is pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: This is a budget model HD TV, but you know, so far the picture is pretty darn good.

customer_reviews.text: We hung this in our kitchen. LOVE IT. Great picture.

customer_reviews.text: a 50" for $349 total sounds good to me ! Perfect in every way, the ONLY thing is that the speaker volume even at 100% is not that much but again that is what a $50 sound bar is for so no big deal, I have a 30 year old PROSCAN this is the replacement talking about LOYALTY ! LOL

customer_reviews.text: Picture is fair at best, no matter what the source. Speakers are terrible. You WILL have to add additional external speakers.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I really love this TV. I just could not get my remote programmed so I would only have to use one remote. But I do love the TV...

customer_reviews.text: The tv stopped working few weeks after I bought it...and there is no return ! The screen becomes unicolour.

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend at all

customer_reviews.title: Good prodict for money
customer_reviews.text: As of today i will give it a 4 star rating. Sounds is not great but plan to hook it to a sound system. Volumn control on metrocast remote does not work so it appears will have to deal with to remotes. Picture qualoty ok though my old Dynex seemed better. Will rewrite these review in a couple of months on performance. It's been two years and picture is still good. Sound better with sound system. This TV runs 24/7 and has had no glitches in operation. So will keep the rating posted.

customer_reviews.title: Would like to NOT have it come up with the ProScan ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had no problems. Would like to NOT have it come up with the ProScan label every time I turn it on tho.

customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a different stand then want it comes with but this tv is a great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product - AVOID!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor picture quality, the speakers are horrible, no remote control.

customer_reviews.title: OK, but rotten sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well it is light weight, has OK (not great) picture quality. The sound is terrible!! Sounds like someone talking into a tin can. I'm not picky about sound. Most TV's are fine but this one is horrible and irritating. If you get it, prepare to connect the headphone jack to decent external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't recognize the remote but that's fine, I'll turn on the TV with the remote ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and they are a charm. Warning: It is hard to program these TVs to your cable box. Doesn't recognize the remote but that's fine, I'll turn on the TV with the remote the TV came with and use the cable remote for everything else. Still a great buy (2 for a little less than $250).
customer_reviews.author: Y. F.

customer_reviews.title: dorm room set
customer_reviews.text: Came as described , bought it for my daughters dorm room . It arrived on time and packaged well. The picture quality is pretty darn good , good bang for the buck. Had it now for 2 months and she reports no issues , hooked it to her apple t.v. And does great .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it if u can make one in 80 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it if u can make one in 80 inch i will buy it its an amazing product this is the best color i have seen in a tv better than samsung
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great value - only two small problems
customer_reviews.text: Great value - only two small problems. Volume control on the remote is on the right side, everyone else is on the left. Also, can't find the Verizon fios remote code to operate the proscan tv. Anyone know what it is? I've got a VC P265V remote.
customer_reviews.author: John Eckenrode

customer_reviews.title: Product was liked but the shipper messed up
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV the only problems is the top part seems to have a color problem but that might be from kids messing with the color or it being slanted. The first time I received it the piece that connects the base to the TV was missing so I had to return my so birthday gift and wait. Also the package was already opened before and had been taped shut. It was supposed to be new but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: alannah Augustine lebow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacment TV for RV Bedroom at a GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV as a replacment for the one in the bedroom of my RV. The Picture and color are great but most of all. It is very low profile. Much more so than the JVC LCD that it replaced. Seeing as how the JVC was 6 years old it is completly understandable. Whats more is this TV is less than a hundred dollars. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Measurmemts are completely off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv because I had a specific size requirement. I compared dimensions on many different models before choosing this one. It arrive today and is a total of 17 in wide by 10 in tall. I’m so disappointed, as the listed measurements listed the total width as 21.5, height of 15.5. It’s completely off. If the box didn’t say it was a 19 inch tv, I would have presumed they sent me the wrong one. So irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Revrac

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I returned this TV because the sound quality was so poor. It completely lacked any low frequency response. It would probably be fine if connected to a home audio system.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: This TV has a great picture. 1080 P is great
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a great picture. 1080 P is great. work very well as PC monitor.

customer_reviews.title: excellent option
customer_reviews.text: It has only been a couple of days, but the unit seems to be well above the quality I expected for the cost, and does a really good job. I like the very light weight, the easy hook-up and simple set up. I am not certain if it really does work, but even on the power save mode the picture is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Zippytazros

customer_reviews.title: Sound is just fine..
customer_reviews.text: This is a 32 inch TV for emergency power outages.... Sound is just fine... Picture is alright... Would also be great for a garage tv... maybe an rv, 5th wheel... kids room?

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give it 4 stars instead of 5 because the comcast/xfinity remote does not work with the TV but that is also comcast/xfinitys fault not 100% the TVs fault.

customer_reviews.title: We gave the TV to a senior citizen. I ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave the TV to a senior citizen. I hope this one with the warranty can last longer than another one we bought her two years ago. Delivery as always is beyond expectations. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: You'll definitely need to attach a better sound system to it
customer_reviews.text: If this were a $500 tv it would be s***ty. But for the price it does its job. You'll definitely need to attach a better sound system to it. The built in one really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real bad speakers; stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible speakers, thus the audio of this TV is extremely difficult to hear clearly. I would not buy this product, or any Proscan TV again!

customer_reviews.title: Good TV/monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this TV for my son to replace an older RCA that went out... Works pretty well...good picture... no complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic 48" TV with no surprises. The picture is fine. I needed at least 3 HDMI ports and VGA. This fit the bill. It has coaxial digital output, so you'll need a converter to optical if your other equipment needs it. I'm happy with the purchase. 3.5 is what I'd give it if possible. It's not thrilling, but it gets the job done at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Owen

customer_reviews.title: Very  very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice. Gets lots of channels with just an antenna. The sound and picture is good but not great.

customer_reviews.title: outer box arrived in great condition.  the TV box had a big hole in it.  disappointed.  should treat your customers better

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I ignored bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I see some people complaining about this and honestly I do not see why (unless they are trying to get people to buy their products) I have it with cable, no HD service and it looks amazing, I love the fact that it is light almost no weight at all (14.5 lbs) my 4 years old daughter can lift it and knowing my wife she WILL eventually drop it (unless I wall mount it) hopefully it will not break LOL.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv . perfect brand new. Nothing what's so ever wrong . I highly suggest this item.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV for the price. If you're just careful you won't ruin the screen. The speakers aren't good but you can't expect that much from a tv at this price. Super satisfied, but not recommended for people that are picky on sound and video quality. If your just a normal person trying to fid an OK tv that get this one.

product_meta.title: Proscan PLED2243A 22-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
product_meta.description: Size:22-InchAre you looking for a TV that can do it all? Small enough to fit in any room, bedroom, kitchen, office...but large enough to produce a high quality large picture? Stop right here, you have found the one! Pros can's 22-Inch super slim LED high definition TV does it all. Offering you a crystal clear picture and great sound, you will enjoy this TV for years to come. Watch any over the air broadcast with the built in digital TV tuner. you can use this as a computer monitor, for your game console and so much more. The TV is sleek and will look great mounted on your wall or sitting on your desk/cabinet. With a ton of ports and connections you can plug this TV into just about anything. Sit back and relax this TV will make you smile.
feature_bullets: Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 20.25'' x 12.63" x 2.13'', TV with stand: 20.25'' x 14.25'' x6.38 ''
Inputs: 1 HDMI, 1 VGA, 1 YPBPR, 1 RF, 1 PC, 1 Audio/Video

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars434 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
